newsArray.title: Shocking! 'I couldn't take it': Jemimah on deleting WhatsApp after WC win
newsArray.description: Indian cricketer Jemimah Rodrigues deactivated WhatsApp after receiving a thousand messages post her semi-final heroics in the Women's World Cup. Overwhelmed by the attention while preparing for the final, she disconnected from digital platforms to maintain focus. This highlights the immense public interest in women's cricket and the challenges athletes face managing newfound fame.
creator: TOI Sports Desk

newsArray.title: Cricket betting racket busted, 2 held
newsArray.description: Delhi Police busted two cricket betting rackets. One in Vikaspuri, using the Plus Project 2025 app, and the other in Paharganj during the IPL 2025 season. Multiple arrests were made, with betting conducted online and offline, using various devices and apps.
creator: Tribune News Service
